info.name: Hyper Racers X
info.description: Hyper Racers X is Realtime Multiplayer Car Racing Game

request.description:
**API Description:**

*   This is the first API request from the game client
    

**Request Keys:**

> `app_ver - App Version`

> `device_id - Unique Mobile Device ID`

> `platform - Platform Used (1-Android, 2-iOS, etc.,)`

> `email_id - Users Email Id`

**Response Keys:**

> `status - Server Operation Status (S - Success, E- Error)`

> `msg - Message`

> `mp_base_url - Multiplayer Base URL Endpoint`

> `api_base_url - API Base URL Endpoint`

> `p_url - Privacy page URL for registration screen`

> `app_config - Which contains the status like maintanance and forced update`

response.name: Success
Forced Update
Maintanance Mode
Error

request.description:
**API Description:**

*   User can register with the game, using their email address.
    

**Request Keys:**

> `app_ver - App Version`

> `device_id - Unique Mobile Device ID`

> `platform - Platform Used (1-Android, 2-iOS, etc.,)`

> `email_id - Users Email Id`
> 
> `t_c - Terms & Conditions`

**Response Keys:**

> `status - Server Operation Status (S - Success, E- Error)`

> `msg - Message`

> `otp_expiry- Resend button delay duration purpose only`

> `otp_retry- Limiting the resend button`

> `response_code - Response Code for 1 - Success, 0 - Failded`

> `app_config - Which contains the status like maintanance and forced update`

**Screen:**

![](https://cdn-sharing.adobecc.com/content/storage/id/urn:aaid:sc:US:059bf62c-b1e5-4399-8f89-0bd7dc4f0aac;revision=8?component_id=86488d1c-dfa7-4177-b56f-29941716b144&api_key=CometServer1&access_token=1646932645_urn:aaid:sc:US:059bf62c-b1e5-4399-8f89-0bd7dc4f0aac;public_f1b940ad079f955aaaaf2dad89e311e067a87087)

response.name: Registation Success
Already Registered
Account Blocked
Maintanance Mode
Error

request.description:
**API Description:**

*   User can login with the game, using their email address.
    

**Request Keys:**

> `app_ver - App Version`

> `device_id - Unique Mobile Device ID`

> `platform - Platform Used (1-Android, 2-iOS, etc.,)`

> `email_id - Users Email Id`

**Response Keys:**

> `status - Server Operation Status (S - Success, E- Error)`

> `msg - Message`

> `otp_expiry- Resend button delay duration purpose only`

> `otp_retry- Limiting the resend button`

> `response_code - Response Code for 1 - Success, 0 - Failded`

> `app_config - Which contains the status like maintanance and forced update`

**Screen:**

![](https://cdn-sharing.adobecc.com/content/storage/id/urn:aaid:sc:US:059bf62c-b1e5-4399-8f89-0bd7dc4f0aac;revision=6?component_id=d6fcf01b-7a95-4bb0-ad37-93ea3dfcc4d0&api_key=CometServer1&access_token=1646932645_urn:aaid:sc:US:059bf62c-b1e5-4399-8f89-0bd7dc4f0aac;public_f1b940ad079f955aaaaf2dad89e311e067a87087)

request.description:
**API Description:**

Entered OTP is send to server to check whether the OTP is valid or not

**Request Keys:**

> `app_ver - App Version`

> `device_id - Unique Mobile Device ID`

> `platform - Platform Used (1-Android, 2-iOS, etc.,)`

> `email_id - Users Email Id`
> 
> `otp - OTP`

**Response Keys:**

> `status - Server Operation Status (S - Success, E- Error)`

> `msg - Message`
> 
> `gid - Guardian ID`

> `response_code - Response Code for 1 - Success, 0 - Failded`
> 
> `od_login - Other device login`
> 
> `token - Header token`
> 
> `r_bonus - referral bonus`

> `app_config - Which contains the status like maintanance and forced update`
> 
> `Game_tips`

response.name: OTP Valid
OTP Valid Other Login
OTP In-valid
Maintanance Mode
Error

request.description:
**API Description:**

Update nickname and referral data in single API.

**Request Keys:**

> `app_ver - App Version`

> `device_id - Unique Mobile Device ID`

> `platform - Platform Used (1-Android, 2-iOS, etc.,)`

> `email_id - Users Email Id`
> 
> `gid - Guardian ID`
> 
> `nickname - user's nickname`

**Response Keys:**

> `status - Server Operation Status (S - Success, E- Error)`

> `msg - Message`

> `Landing type - / 1 - loan car / 2 - Free car / 3 - Dashboard.`

> `app_config - Which contains the status like maintanance and forced update`
> 
> `c_xp - current xp`
> 
> `t_xp - total xp`
> 
> `d_xp - display xp`
> 
> `d_t - display time`
> 
> `alerts: [ i - inbox , m - missions , r - referral ]`
> 
> `body: [c_stat - color , c - color , cst - color state transition , ctd - color transition delay]`
> 
> `rim: [c - rim color , sty -rim style , surf - surface , lin - rim lining]`
> 
> `add_l - additional lights`
> 
> `s- show`
> 
> `d- description`
> 
> `attr - attributes [ t_s - total speed , a - acceleration , h - handling , b - brake , wgt - weight]`
> 
> `o_a_a - obstacle aware acceleration`
> 
> `o_s_t - obstacle steer tracking`
> 
> `d_c - drift control`
> 
> `r_p_m - racing pattern monitoring`
> 
> `a_c_m - adaptive cruise management`

response.name: Only Nickname
Invalid Nickname
Valid Nickname Valid Referral
Valid Nickname Invalid Referral
Landing to Loan Screen
Landing to Free NFT Car
Maintanance Mode
Error

request.description:
**API Description:**

Every time game opens data stored in the shared preference need to checked with the server.

**Request Keys:**

> `app_ver - App Version`

> `device_id - Unique Mobile Device ID`

> `platform - Platform Used (1-Android, 2-iOS, 3-Web)`

> `email_id - Users Email Id`
> 
> `gid - Guardian ID`

**Response Keys:**

> `status - Server Operation Status (S - Success, E- Error)`

> `msg - Message`

> `Landing type - / 1 - loan car / 2 - Free car / 3 - Dashboard.`

> `app_config - Which contains the status like maintanance and forced update`

response.name: Landing to Dashboard
Landing to Nickename & Referral
Other Device Login
Maintanance Mode
Error

request.description:
User's Referral Details

**Request Keys:**

> `app_ver - App Version`

> `device_id - Unique Mobile Device ID`

> `platform - Platform Used (1-Android, 2-iOS, 3-Web)`

> `email_id - Users Email Id`
> 
> `gid - Guardian ID`

**Response Keys:**

> `status - Server Operation Status (S - Success, E- Error)`
> 
> `msg - Message`
> 
> `response_code - Response Code for 1 - Success, 0 - Failded`
> 
> `app_config - Which contains the status like maintanance and forced update`

> `r_code = Referral code,`

> `r_count = Redeem count,`

> `r_bonus = Referral bonus,`

> `c_bonus = claimable bonus`
> 
> `trans_id = transaction id`

response.name: New Referral Generated
response.body:
{
  "status": "S",
  "r_code": "ABCDEF",
  "r_count": 10,
  "r_bonus": 100,
  "c_bonus": 0,
  "trans_id":"",
  "is_reedemed": "N",
  "msg": "Referral Code Generated Succesfully",
  "app_config": {
    "f_u": "N",
    "m": "N",
    "i_d": "N",
    "m_t": 0
  }
}

> `device_id - Unique Mobile Device ID`

> `platform - Platform Used (1-Android, 2-iOS, 3-Web)`

> `gid - Guardian ID`

>

>

response.name: Successful
response.body:
{
  "status": "S",
  "msg": "Success",
  "app_config": {
    "f_u": "N",

request.description:
**Request Keys:**

> `app_ver - App Version`

> `device_id - Unique Mobile Device ID`

> `platform - Platform Used (1-Android, 2-iOS, 3-Web)`

> `email_id - Users Email Id`
> 
> `gid - Guardian ID`

**Response Keys:**

> `status - Server Operation Status (S - Success, E- Error)`
> 
> `msg - Message`
> 
> `response_code - Response Code for 1 - Success, 0 - Failded`
> 
> `app_config - Which contains the status like maintanance and forced update`

> `device_id - Unique Mobile Device ID`

> 
> `gid - Guardian ID`

> `status - Server Operation Status (S - Success, E- Error)`
> 
> `msg - Message`
> 
> `response_code - Response Code for 1 - Success, 0 - Failed`

> `data - Summary in the community page`
> 
> `img - social media image link`
> 
> `ver - version`
> 
> `url - social media URL`
